queries.name: Name
queries.description: Returns all employee event from Bob

queries.name: Array
queries.description: Returns all employee events with home addresses on Park Avenue
queries.query: select * from NewEmployeeEvent where name = 'Ted' and address('home').streetName='Park Avenue'

queries.name: Long
queries.description: Returns all employee events with home addresses on Park Avenue
queries.query: select * from NewEmployeeEvent where name = 'Bill' and address('work').streetNumber=23
